General.Name: Jiangxi Lianchuang Opto-electronic Science & Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangxi Lianchuang Opto-Electronic Science&Technologyco.,Ltd engages in the  research and development, production, and sale of semiconductor laser and high temperature equipment series products in China. It offers fiber-coupled output pump source modules, military semiconductor discrete devices, MEMS sensors, and optocouplers, which are used in the field of military equipment, such as satellites, arrows, bombs, ships, aircraft, and other supporting domestic military units; and electronic components. Its high-temperature equipment series products are used in copper-aluminum extrusion, high-end metal heating, crystalline silicon growth furnace, metal smelting, semiconductor melting, superconducting magnetic separation, aerospace and military materials, magnetic energy storage, controllable nuclear fusion, and magnetic levitation scenes, such as trains. In addition, the company provides control series products, such as electronic toilet, massage chair, rice cooker, and water storage electric water heater controllers, as well as washing machine FOC variable frequency drives and induction cooker displays that are used in home appliance control, new energy vehicle electronics and industrial control fields; and laser devices comprising laser power supply systems, diode pumped laser gain modules, fiber-optic laser products, semiconductor laser stack light source products, and light and small pigtail LD products. Further, it offers fiber optic, RF, charging pile, anti-burning, and HLF series coaxial cables, as well as feeders; backlight source series products, which are used in backlight display fields, such as mobile phones, tablets, industrial control, automotive, and computers; and optoelectronic communication and intelligent equipment cables, and metal material products that are used in communication products and related equipment, computer networks, military use in other fields. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Nanchang, China.
